description:
APPY GEEK is a specially designed app for technology enthusiasts that lets you track the latest and most relevant topics across technology and innovation ...

With hundreds of news articles every day (including TechRadar, New Media Age, Pocket-Lint, Technology Blogged, Tech Watch and more..) APPY GEEK offers:
- A unique dynamic TagNav system to browse the latest breaking news keeping you up to date on the most important stories and key events. This system highlights major keywords (e.g. “Android,” “Facebook,” or even “Mountain view”) across all news stories worldwide. Whether you want to keep up on the next game release on PS3, the top wordpress addons, or the latest smartphones buzz, News Republic has got you covered. Simply click on the keyword to create your very own dedicated news channel on that particular topic. You choose the subjects, and News Republic brings you the news instantly!
- Create and personalize your own news feeds and prioritize those topics that are of specific interest to you.
-Share on Twitter and Facebook with all your friends.

APPY GEEK is based on the highly rated and one of this years’ most popular News Apps, News Republic, published by Mobiles Republic.
Specially designed for WebOS.
